name: CrazyIdeas
0:
”Alexa, tell crazy ideas to search for crazy ideas”
”Scan for ideas”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crazy ideas
des: The Shower Thoughts Alexa Skill reads posts from the Reddit subreddit Crazy Ideas (https://www.reddit.com/r/crazyideas/). Hear about many bewildering, crazy ideas from people all over the world! This skill is a great way to have fun with friends or get your daily dose of humor.
